property.name: xlearning.am.memory
property.description: AM申请所需内存大小，单位为MB

property.name: xlearning.am.cores
property.description: AM申请所需CPU核数

property.name: xlearning.worker.num
property.description: worker启动数目

property.name: xlearning.worker.memory
property.description: worker申请使用内存大小，单位为MB

property.name: xlearning.worker.cores
property.description: worker申请使用CPU核数

property.name: xlearning.ps.num
property.description: ps启动数目，默认作业不使用ParameterServer机制

property.name: xlearning.ps.memory
property.description: ps申请使用内存大小，默认单位为MB

property.name: xlearning.ps.cores
property.description: ps申请使用CPU核数

property.name: xlearning.app.queue
property.description: 作业提交队列

property.name: xlearning.app.priority
property.description: 作业优先级，级别0-5，分别对应DEFAULT、VERY_LOW、LOW、NORMAL、HIGH、VERY_HIGH

property.name: xlearning.input.strategy
property.description: 输入文件加载模式，目前主要有DOWNLOAD、STREAM、PLACEHOLDER

property.name: xlearning.stream.epoch
property.description: 输入文件加载次数，该选项只用于输入文件加载策略为STREAM时

property.name: xlearning.input.stream.shuffle
property.description: 输入文件是否采用shuffle模式，该选项只用于输入文件加载模式为STREAM时

property.name: xlearning.inputformat.class
property.description: STREAM模式下，输入文件inputformat类指定

property.name: xlearning.output.local.dir
property.description: 输出文件本地默认路径，该选项只用于作业提交参数output未指定本地输出路径时

property.name: xlearning.output.strategy
property.description: 输出文件加载策略，目前主要有UPLOAD、STREAM

property.name: xlearning.outputformat.class
property.description: STREAM模式下，输出文件outputformat类指定

property.name: xlearning.input.stream.shuffle
property.description: 输入文件是否采用shuffle模式，该选项只用于输入文件加载模式为STREAM时

property.name: xlearning.interresult.dir
property.description: 指定模型中间结果上传至HDFS子路径

property.name: xlearning.interresult.upload.timeout
property.description: 模型中间结果上传至HDFS超时时长设置，单位为毫秒
